underpay.translation[0].definitions[0].d: to pay someone too little for their work
underpay.translation[1].definitions[0].d: to pay less money to people than they deserve for their work
underpay.translation[1].definitions[0].e: In an interview, the star said that the studio underpays and misuses him.
underpay.translation[1].definitions[1].d: to pay less money to a person or organization than is owed to them
underpay.translation[1].definitions[1].e: The construction company had underpaid its income, employment and excise taxes by $3.2 billion over an eleven-year period.
